sentences.sContent: Hopefully the agreement reached in Nagoya will change all that.
sentences.sCn: 在名古屋达成的协议将有望改变这一切。

sentences.sContent: Each will be targeted at a particular government, and they will be asked to sign up to it before the meeting in Nagoya.
sentences.sCn: 每一项任务均针对一个特定的政府，要求他们在名古屋召开会议之前将其签署。
